raska.name: raska
raska.description: The basic shape of an Raska element

_helpers.name: _helpers
_helpers.description: An utility that wraps the commom taks to avoid code repetition

_defaultConfigurations.name: _defaultConfigurations
_defaultConfigurations.description: A utility container that holds default instance information for the Raska library

_basicElement.name: _basicElement
_basicElement.description: The basic shape of an Raska element

htmlElement.name: htmlElement
htmlElement.description: Wraps any HTML element as a Raska element

_drawing.name: _drawing
_drawing.description: An utility container that holds all the drawing related implementations

_mouse.name: _mouse
_mouse.description: A utility that detects mouse's relative position on the canvas

staticCoordinates.name: staticCoordinates
staticCoordinates.description: Gathers the mouse coordinates without the need of an event bubble

_elementBeingDraged.name: _elementBeingDraged
_elementBeingDraged.description: A utility that tracks the state of the element being draged (if any)

_public.name: _public
_public.description: All public avaliable methods from the Raska library

classitems.description: Whether or not to actually log the messages (should be 'false' in production code)
classitems.name: active

classitems.description: Prints an informational message to the console
classitems.name: info

params.name: msg
params.description: The message to be shown

params.name: o
params.description: Any extra message data

classitems.description: Whether or not a given object type is of the type you expect
classitems.name: is

params.name: obj
params.description: The object we whant to know about

params.name: what
params.description: The string representing the name of the type

return.description: Whether or not the object matches the specified type

classitems.description: Generates a pseudo-random Id
classitems.name: generateId

classitems.description: Whether or not a given object type is valid to be handled
classitems.name: isValid

params.name: obj
params.description: The object we whant to know is it's valid to be handled

return.description: Whether or not the object is valid to be handled

classitems.description: Whether or not a given object type is undefined
classitems.name: isUndefined

params.name: obj
params.description: The object we whant to know is it's undefined

return.description: Whether or not the object is undefined

classitems.description: Extends any object using a base template object as reference
classitems.name: extend

params.name: baseObject
params.description: The object we whant to copy from

params.name: impl
params.description: The object with the data we want use

params.name: addNewMembers
params.description: Whether or not we allow new members on the 'impl' object to be used in the result

classitems.description: The valid position types for a Raskel element
classitems.name: _positionTypes

classitems.description: Element position will be relative to its parent (if any)
classitems.name: relative

classitems.description: Element position will be absolute and will have no regard about its parent position whatsoever
classitems.name: relative

classitems.description: Points to a parent Raska element (if any)
classitems.name: $parent

classitems.description: Points to a Raska element [as an arrow] (if any) related as a dependency from this node
classitems.name: $linksTo

classitems.description: Points to a Raska element [as an arrow] (if any) that depends on this instance
classitems.name: $linksFrom

classitems.description: Points to series of child Raska element (if any) that, usually, are contained inside this node
classitems.name: $childElements

classitems.description: Clears all links that point to and from this Raska element
classitems.name: clearLinksFrom

params.name: source
params.description: Object that defines the source of the link removal (start node)

params.name: each
params.description: Delegates that handle the process of removing the references

classitems.description: The element name
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: Creates a link between this and another element, using the later as a dependency of this instance
classitems.name: addLinkTo

params.name: element
params.description: Element that will be linked as a destination from this element node

classitems.description: Removes the dependency from this element to another Raska element
classitems.name: removeLinkTo

params.name: element
params.description: Element that will have its link to this element removed

classitems.description: Gathers all elements that this instance depends on
classitems.name: getLinksTo

return.description: All elements that this node references TO

classitems.description: Links this element to another Raska element as this instance being the target node
classitems.name: addLinkFrom

params.name: element
params.description: Element that will be linked as a source from this element node

classitems.description: Gathers all dependecies/linked elements related to this instance
classitems.name: getLinksFrom

return.description: All elements that this node references from

classitems.description: Removes the link to this element from another Raska element
classitems.name: removeLinkFrom

params.name: element
params.description: Element that will have its link from this element removed

classitems.description: Removes every and each link that references this element
classitems.name: clearAllLinks

classitems.description: Gathers all child elements from this node
classitems.name: getChildElements

classitems.description: Adds a new child element to this node

params.name: child
params.description: Element that will be added to the child array into this element

classitems.description: Get the parent node to this element

return.description: Reference to de parent node (null if none)

classitems.description: Retrieves the element boundaries information

classitems.description: Sets the parent node to this element

params.description: Element that will be added as a parent to this element
